select nvl(max(pdt_no),0)+1 from Product
insert into PRODUCT( pdt_no, pdt_cate_no, pdt_seller_no, pdt_address_no, pdt_name, pdt_desc, pdt_price, pdt_status) values ( #{pdtNo}, #{pdtCateNo}, #{pdtSellerNo}, #{pdtAddressNo}, #{pdtName}, #{pdtDesc}, #{pdtPrice}, #{pdtStatus} )
mapper.update: update PRODUCT set pdt_views = pdt_views+1 where pdt_no = #{pdtNo} and pdt_seller_no != #{pdtSellerNo}
mapper.select: SELECT b.pdt_no, b.pdt_address_no, b.pdt_name, b.pdt_status, b.pdt_price, b.pdt_views, b.pdt_created_at FROM ( SELECT /*+ index_desc(PRODUCT PK_PRODUCT) */ ROWNUM AS rnum, a.pdt_no, a.pdt_address_no, a.pdt_name, a.pdt_status, a.pdt_price, a.pdt_views, a.pdt_created_at FROM ( SELECT pdt_no, pdt_address_no, pdt_name, pdt_status, pdt_price, pdt_views, pdt_created_at FROM product p left join address d on p.pdt_address_no = d.address_no where d.address_si = #{addressSi} and d.address_gu = #{addressGu} and d.address_dong = #{addressDong} ORDER BY pdt_no DESC ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end} ) b WHERE b.rnum >= #{start}
